author: Reuters
title: U.S. health official projects grim death toll as naval ships arrive to ease burden
description: In Washington, health officials continue to urge Americans to follow stay-at-home orders and other measures to contain the spread of the novel coronavirus.
content: White House health experts had argued strongly with U.S. President Donald Trump to extend a stay-at-home order for Americans fighting the spread of the coronavirus, so the country could start seeing the rates of infection come down, a top U.S. health official… [+6088 chars]
